Sentencas: Polyvinylidene fluoride (PVDF) is a kind of adhesive with high stability and good resistance to chemical corrosion, and it has been applied in various fields.
Titulo: A polymer-assistant for novel semiconductor-ionic membrane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this work, PVDF was introduced into a semiconducting-ionic conductor material to fabricate a new electrolyte for low temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: A polymer-assistant for novel semiconductor-ionic membrane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: We prepared the LaCePr-carbonates (LCP)-Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-delta (SFM) in various mass ratios.
Titulo: A polymer-assistant for novel semiconductor-ionic membrane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A remarkable maximum power output of 505 mW cm(-2) was attained along with a high open circuit voltage (OCV) of 1.04 V at 550 degrees C by the 8LCP-2SFM sample.
Titulo: A polymer-assistant for novel semiconductor-ionic membrane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrical properties of the composites with different weight ratios were studied through EIS measurements and polarization curves.
Titulo: A polymer-assistant for novel semiconductor-ionic membrane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It was found that performance can be enhanced by introducing an appropriate PVDF into an LCP-SFM composite.
Titulo: A polymer-assistant for novel semiconductor-ionic membrane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The composite of 8LCP-2SFM with wt. 3% PVDF exhibits a higher power output, that is up to 671 mW cm(-2), than other composite samples at 550 degrees C. Interestingly, the performance can be further improved by a low temperature heat treatment.
Titulo: A polymer-assistant for novel semiconductor-ionic membrane solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: These findings confirm that mixing an appropriate PVDF into a composite is an effective way to improve the performance of the cells as well as the mechanical properties.
Titulo: A polymer-assistant for novel semiconductor-ionic membrane solid oxide fuel cells
